marytts.unitselection.data
Class Unit

java.lang.Object
  marytts.unitselection.data.Unit
Direct Known Subclasses:
DiphoneUnit, VocalizationUnit
public class Unit
extends java.lang.Object

Representation of a unit from a unit database. This gives access to everything that is known about a given unit, including all sorts of features and the actual audio data.

Author:
Marc Schröder

Field Detail

startTime

public final long startTime
Unit start time, expressed in samples. To convert into time, divide by UnitFileReader.getSampleRate().

duration

public final int duration
Unit duration, expressed in samples. To convert into time, divide by UnitFileReader.getSampleRate().

index

public final int index
Index position of this unit in the unit file.

Method Detail

isEdgeUnit

public boolean isEdgeUnit()
Determine whether the unit is an "edge" unit, i.e. a unit marking the start or the end of an utterance.

Parameters:
i - The index of the considered unit.
Returns:
true if the unit is an edge unit, false otherwise
